message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it will greatly benefit your business. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $14,000 for it.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'd be willing to pay $12,500 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a competitive offer. Considering the value of the product and our costs, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $13,500 for the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $13,500 is closer, I'm still not quite there. Let's split the difference - I'll offer $13,000 for the product. This would be a fair price for both of us.
